contentrichtext.text: {{for|the album by Adrienne Young|Room to Grow (album)}} '''''Room to Grow''''' is a [[Television in Canada|Canadian]] [[home improvement]] [[television show]] starring Amanda Eaton and Carson Arthur. The series airs in [[Canada]] on [[Prime (Canadian television network)|Prime]], at 11 p.m. EST Mondays. Some stations in Canada's [[Global Television Network|Global]] network also air the program in a daytime slot on weekdays. The series focuses primarily on outdoor [[landscaping]] improvements, such as backyard and garden spaces. ==External links== * [http://www.carsonarthur.com/ Carson Arthur] [[Category:Canadian reality television series]] [[Category:2004 Canadian television series debuts]] [[Category:Global Television Network shows]] {{nonfiction-tv-prog-stub}}
